metadata.purpose: About Contact360 page displaying company information, mission, values, and story. We're on a mission to democratize B2B data accuracy.

uses_endpoints.description: Get marketing page content dynamically. Falls back to static content if API fails.

content_sections.title: About Contact360
content_sections.subtitle: We're on a mission to democratize B2B data accuracy.

value_propositions.title: Data Integrity
value_propositions.description: We never scrape LinkedIn. Our data is ethically sourced and double-verified.

value_propositions.title: Real-time Verification
value_propositions.description: Our SMTP handshake protocol ensures 99% deliverability rates.

value_propositions.title: Customer First
value_propositions.description: We build tools that empower growth teams, not just databases.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded in 2024, Contact360 started with a simple observation: B2B data was too expensive and too inaccurate. We built a proprietary engine that verifies data in real-time, ensuring you only pay for contacts that actually exist.
